Name: Cafe Bambino
column10: 1. Duplicate this sheet and rename it with your name

Name: Fresh Flours
column10: 3. If you don't have an opinion on a coffee shop, you can leave it blank

Name: The Station
column10: 2. Rate each coffee shop along each dimension with a number from 1-5

Name: Bakery Nouveau
Notes: The coffee here is consistently mediocre, but the food is great.

Name: Caffe Vita
Notes: Beans are roasted too dark for my taste

Name: Fuel (19th)
Notes: I can't remember anything good or bad about the coffee so it's probably decent.

Name: General Porpoise
Notes: Never ordered the coffee here, but they have a good selection of beans. Donuts are amazing.

Name: Good Weather Bicycle & Cafe
Notes: I love sitting outside in the sun with a coffee on weekend mornings. Great vibe, espresso seems solid.

Name: Joe Bar
Notes: Such a cute space. My memory of the coffee is mediocre, but the food and vibe make this a must visit.

Name: Starbucks Reserve
Notes: The coffee is actually good. Too crowded usually.

Name: Victrola (15th)
Notes: Hard to get a table, but awesome place to work if you can.

Name: Vivace
Notes: Get an 8oz Cafe Nico. You're welcome. There's also a quiet study room.

Name: Vivace Sidewalk Stop
Notes: There's something really cute about the sidewalk stand. Combine with a trip to the capitol hill farmers market for a perfect Sunday.

Name: Katy's
Notes: The coffee is overroasted garbage, but the place is cute overall

Name: Solstice
Notes: Too noisy and mediocre coffee. All that saves this place is nostalgia and the espresso cream cheese brownie.
